comments.html:
No apology necessary, Ivan. When the guys in the Ivory Tower get excited, that means it's time to start paying attention. :-)

Cheers,
Brad
comments.name: Brad Hedlund

comments.html: Ivan, you seem to be a little less skeptical about OpenFlow (or SDN) than before. Is it because you see more use cases where OpenFlow can work? or because you see more vendors like Cisco start to support it?
comments.name: Anonymous

comments.html: Actually, I've seen that a lot of people understand the realities of OpenFlow, and got a few additional interesting ideas from Juniper's approach to hybrid model.
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: Ivan, there is no need to apologize for genuine, heartfelt enthusiasm. It's a good thing, a positive force. Thanks for providing the video presentations from the event. I wish I could have been there.
comments.name: Brad Casemore
